## ModuleWithRoles.prepareBatchMetadata() method

Prepares a list of metadata for uploading.

<b>Signature:</b>


|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  metadata | [MetadataURIOrObject](./sdk.metadatauriorobject.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List of metadata to prepare for upload. |
